item.title: 挪威 1.5 万亿美元基金对力拓巴西矿山表示担忧
item.description: 挪威1.5万亿美元主权财富基金的道德顾问向力拓集团提出了对巴西一座矿山的环境影响的担忧，这再次引发了对该基金作为该公司投资者的未来角色的质疑。【原文：The ethics adviser to Norway’s $1.5 trillion sovereign wealth fund has raised concerns with Rio Tinto Group about the environmental impact of a mine in Brazil, reviving questions about the fund’s future role as an investor in the company.】

item.title: 大卫-艾因霍恩为化工公司索尔维下长线赌注
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）表示，他正在押注欧洲基本化学品公司索尔维公司（Solvay SA）。【原文：David Einhorn said he’s betting on European essential chemicals company Solvay SA.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Drive Capital 即将向 Collective Global 出售股权
item.description: Drive Capital 即将完成向投资公司 Collective Global 出售少数股权的交易。【原文：Drive Capital is finalizing the sale of a minority stake to investment firm Collective Global.】

item.title: 巴黎俱乐部将埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议的最后期限延长至六月
item.description: 据说，主要由发达国家债权国组成的巴黎俱乐部已将埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织达成初步救助协议的最后期限延长了三个月，至 6 月底。【原文：The Paris Club of mostly developed country creditors is said to have extended a deadline for Ethiopia to reach a preliminary bailout deal with the International Monetary Fund by three months to the end of June.】

item.title: 美联储继续等待减息，3 月份债券收益率罕见地达到 0.0
item.description: 由于债券市场仍在努力从数十年来最严重的亏损中恢复过来，免税债券带来了如今算得上是好消息的消息：3 月份，投资者没有损失一分钱。【原文：With the bond market still struggling to recover from some of the worst losses in decades, tax-exempt debt delivered what counts these days as good news: In March, investors didn’t lose so much as a penny.】

item.title: 欧洲足球联赛寻求 LionTree 帮助其出售少数股权
item.description: 欧洲顶级男子职业篮球联赛（EuroLeague）首席执行官保柳斯-莫泰尤纳斯（Paulius Motiejunas）表示，该公司正在探索通过出售少数股权筹集资金。【原文：EuroLeague, the top tier of men’s professional basketball in Europe, is exploring raising capital through the sale of a minority stake, Chief Executive Officer Paulius Motiejunas said.】

item.title: 法国集团同意以 6.5 亿美元收购加拿大贝利公司
item.description: 法国圣戈班集团同意以 8.8 亿加元（6.5 亿美元）现金收购加拿大贝利集团公司，以扩大其全球金属框架产品的供应范围。【原文：Cie. de Saint-Gobain of France agreed to buy Canada’s Bailey Group of Companies for C$880 million ($650 million) in cash to broaden its global offerings of metal framing products.】

item.title: 前制药公司高管和表弟承认内幕交易柯达股票
item.description: Phlow 公司的一名前高管及其表弟承认利用有关政府向伊士曼柯达公司（Eastman Kodak Co.【原文：A former Phlow Corp. executive and his cousin admitted to insider trading on confidential information about a pandemic-related government loan to Eastman Kodak Co.】

item.title: 智利政客呼吁从中国廉价进口产品中拯救本地钢铁
item.description: 智利政界人士正在极力说服该国唯一一家钢铁制造商推翻因廉价中国合金涌入而关闭业务的决定，这是对该国自由贸易决心的考验。【原文：Chilean politicians are clamoring to convince the country’s only steelmaker to overturn a decision to shutter operations due to an influx of cheap Chinese alloy, testing the nation’s free-trade resolve.】

item.title: 私人信贷基金正在洽谈收购 Trivium Packaging 公司的融资事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，私人信贷基金正在制定计划，为出售美国包装公司 Trivium Packaging 提供多达 25 亿美元的资金。【原文：Private credit funds are working on plans to provide as much as $2.5 billion to finance the sale of US packaging firm Trivium Packaging, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储在决定减息前有时间评估数据
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，尽管最近的物价上涨并未改变利率的大体轨迹，但决策者将等待通胀走低的更明确迹象出现后再降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled policymakers will wait for clearer signs of lower inflation before cutting interest rates, even though a recent bump in prices didn’t alter their broader trajectory.】

item.title: Axa 计划在巴黎奥运会前开展网络风险预防活动
item.description: Axa SA 正在筹划一项活动，以帮助在明年夏季巴黎奥运会之前防止针对法国的网络攻击。【原文：Axa SA is planning a campaign to help prevent cyberattacks targeting France in the run-up to the Paris Olympics next summer.】

item.title: 受劳力士丑闻影响的秘鲁总统寻求国会支持
item.description: 秘鲁不受欢迎的总统很可能会在周三的投票中得到同样不受欢迎的国会的支持，因为双方都无视公众要求他们下台的呼声。【原文：Peru’s unpopular president is likely to receive the backing of the equally-disliked congress in a vote on Wednesday, as both sides defy the public clamor for them to quit.】

item.title: WSP Global 遭遇做空者追杀，股价暴跌
item.description: 在 Spruce Point Capital Management LLC 表示正在做空这家加拿大工程公司的股票，并对其提出 "强烈卖出 "建议后，科进全球公司（WSP Global Inc.【原文：WSP Global Inc. shares plunged after Spruce Point Capital Management LLC said it was shorting the Canadian engineering firm’s stock, slapping it with a “strong sell” recommendation.】

item.title: 裁决后意大利电信可能从意大利收回 10 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）可能会从意大利政府那里拿回约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元），因为罗马上诉法院在一起可追溯到 20 世纪 90 年代末的法律案件中做出了有利于这家前电话垄断商的裁决。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA may get back about €1 billion ($1.1 billion) from the Italian government after a Rome appeal court ruled in favor of the former phone monopolist in a legal case dating back from the late 1990s.】

item.title: 特朗普 SPAC 投资人承认内幕交易罪
item.description: 杰拉尔德-什瓦茨曼（Gerald Shvartsman）在周三的听证会上认罪，他是三名被控与唐纳德-特朗普的媒体公司上市有关的内幕交易的投资者之一。【原文：Gerald Shvartsman, one of three investors charged with insider trading in connection with the listing vehicle that took Donald Trump’s media company public, pleaded guilty at a hearing Wednesday.】

item.title: Natwest 是泰晤士河水务公司债务风波的核心贷款代理机构
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士透露，Natwest Group Plc 是泰晤士河水务公司母公司 1.9 亿英镑（2.39 亿美元）贷款的代理人，这笔贷款将于本月晚些时候偿还。【原文：Natwest Group Plc is the agent on a £190 million ($239 million) loan taken by Thames Water’s parent that’s due for repayment later this month, according to two people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be named because details are private.】

item.title: 福特在美国的销量因混合动力车型交付量大幅增长而上升
item.description: 尽管重新设计的 F-150 皮卡的推出费尽周折，但由于对油电混合动力汽车的强劲需求，福特汽车公司第一季度的美国汽车销量增长了 7%。【原文：Ford Motor Co.’s US auto sales rose 7% in the first quarter on strong demand for gas-electric hybrids, despite a laborious launch of a redesigned F-150 pickup truck.】

item.title: 特鲁多承诺为公寓建设贷款增资数十亿美元
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，即将公布的联邦预算将为一项公寓建设贷款计划增加150亿加元（约合111亿美元）的投入，这是他为解决加拿大人口激增带来的住房短缺问题而做出的最新努力。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said the upcoming federal budget will put C$15 billion ($11.1 billion) more into an apartment construction loan program, the latest in his efforts to address Canada’s shortage of housing as its population surges.】

item.title: 需求激增，乐天将垃圾债券销售额提高至 20 亿美元
item.description: 在投资者的强烈要求下，乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. has upsized its US high-yield bond offering to $2 billion after strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 加密货币中的量子动量交易再度火爆
item.description: 对于加密货币的忠实拥趸来说，购买和持有比特币是城里唯一的交易游戏；仅今年到目前为止，新投资就能获得约 50% 的回报。【原文：To the crypto faithful, buying and holding Bitcoin is the only trading game in town — offering about a 50% return so far this year alone for new investments.】

item.title: 依赖数据的华尔街试图接受它痛恨的数据
item.description:
鲍威尔呢？  "他就像我们其他人一样，"Allspring Global 的帕特尔说

。【原文：

And Powell? “It’s almost as if he’s like the rest of us,” Allspring Global’s Patel says

】

item.title: 中心桥合资公司欲以 12.5 亿美元进行码头交易
item.description: Centerbridge Partners 正通过一家新的合资企业扩大其在游艇码头房地产领域的赌注，该企业计划收购价值超过 12.5 亿美元的房地产。【原文：Centerbridge Partners is extending its bet on marina real estate with a new joint venture that plans to acquire more than $1.25 billion worth of property.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚重返债券市场考验新兴市场垃圾股胃口
item.description: 哥伦比亚今年首次进入全球债务市场，考验投资者对垃圾级新兴市场债券的胃口。【原文：Colombia is tapping global debt markets for the first time this year, testing investor appetite for junk-rated emerging-market bonds.】

item.title: 伊拉克在降低石油产量后仍未能实现欧佩克+的石油目标
item.description: 3 月份，伊拉克再次未能达到欧佩克+ 石油组织的石油生产目标，在该联盟准备审查该国的供应计划时，伊拉克可能会受到更多的审查。【原文：Iraq again missed its OPEC+ oil production target in March, potentially setting itself up for added scrutiny as the alliance prepares to review the country’s plan for supply.】

item.title: 国际清算银行与银行测试跨境支付的代币化
item.description: 2013年6月25日星期二，瑞士巴塞尔，国际清算银行（BIS）总部映入一栋大楼的橱窗。国际清算银行本周表示，各国央行无法在不加剧世界经济风险的情况下扩大宽松的货币政策。摄影师：吉安卢卡-科拉【原文：The headquarters of the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) is reflected in the window of a building in Basel, Switzerland, on Tuesday, June 25, 2013. Central banks can't expand loose monetary policy without exacerbating risks to world economies, the Bank for International Settlements said this week. Photographer: Gianluca Colla】

item.title: 法国总统勒梅尔认为欧洲央行未来数月降息将推动经济增长
阿联酋达成协议后埃及外汇储备达到两年来最高水平
item.description: 在与阿拉伯联合酋长国达成一项具有里程碑意义的投资协议后，埃及的净国际储备飙升至约两年来的最高水平。【原文：Egypt’s net international reserves surged to their highest level in about two years following a landmark investment deal with the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 坎特说：咄咄逼人的反垄断审查损害了竞争
item.description: Moelis & Co.公司副董事长埃里克-坎托（Eric Cantor）说，美国反垄断监管机构过于激进的举措损害了竞争，并可能引导投资者远离美国市场。副董事长埃里克-坎托说。【原文：Overly aggressive moves by US antitrust regulators have hurt competition and could steer investors away from the American market, Moelis & Co. Vice Chairman Eric Cantor said.】

item.title: 棕榈滩精英筹款吸引范德比尔特来佛罗里达
item.description: 佛罗里达州的富裕居民和开发商希望为范德比尔特大学筹集至少 3 亿美元的资金，以便在西棕榈滩建造一座占地广阔的校园。【原文：Wealthy Florida residents and developers are looking to raise at least $300 million for Vanderbilt University to build a sprawling campus in West Palm Beach.】
